ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains THEMIS-E instrument modes. It shows definitively when the spacecraft is in slow survey, fast survey, particle burst, and wave burst modes. The data set is sparsely populated with cadence varying depending upon the frequency of mode transitions.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E fast survey mode
Parameter.Description: Indicates the time intervals where the spacecraft is in fast survey mode.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E particle burst mode
Parameter.Description: Indicates the time intervals where the spacecraft is in particle burst mode.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E wave burst mode
Parameter.Description: Indicates the time intervals where the spacecraft is in wave burst mode.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Slow Survey mode
Parameter.Description: Indicates the time intervals where the spacecraft is in slow survey mode.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-E Ultra Fast Survey mode
Parameter.Description: Indicates the time intervals where the spacecraft is in Ultra Fast Survey mode.
